content.rendered:
One piece of hand baggage is allowed on board which should not exceed 10 Kg (22 lbs.) and dimensions of 22 cm x 38 cm x 65 cm. It should be stowed under the seat in front of you or in the overhead bins.

For more details visit : http://www.aeromar airlines.com/Baggage/Baggage-Information

Aeromar Airlines Checked Baggage

Aeromar Airlines Excess Baggage
